mapper.select: SELECT u.USERNO, u.USERID, u.USERNAME, u.USERGENDER, u.USERADDRESS, u.USERTYPE, u.LASTLOGINDATE, u.ACCOUNT_STATUS, LISTAGG(r.ROLE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY r.ROLE_NAME) AS roles FROM USERS u JOIN USER_ROLES ur ON u.USERID = ur.USERID JOIN ROLES r ON ur.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID GROUP BY u.USERNO, u.USERID, u.USERNAME, u.USERGENDER, u.USERADDRESS, u.USERTYPE, u.LASTLOGINDATE, u.ACCOUNT_STATUS ORDER BY u.USERNO DESC
